DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVE : To compare lispro insulin regular insulin glycemic control patient liver cirrhosis type 2 diabetes subject . METHODS : 108 patient liver cirrhosis type 2 diabetes randomly treat regular insulin lispro . After 122 week cross-over carry patient followed-up 122 week . Then , patient receive standard breakfast 145 kcal follow 12 U.I . regular insulin lispro , C-peptide insulin serum level determine 300 minute .
DOC.brief_title: Lyspro Insulin vs Regular Insulin Cirrhotic Patients
